title: Services
cleaned_text: At The Health Center for Integrative Medicine in Washington, PA, we see patients of all ages, from newborns to the elderly (we call this womb-to-tomb care). We provide comprehensive family medicine in a compassionate, communicative, and supportive environment. Integrative medicine involves using the best possible treatments from both conventional and complementary/alternative medicine based on each patient's individual needs and condition. -Comprehensive Family Medicine for all ages -Women's Health -Gut Health -Vitamins, Supplements, & Herbs -Thyroid Replacement Options -Persistent & diligent exploration of complicated health issues until solutions are found -Telehealth & E-Visits -IV Therapy -EKG Pregnancy Tests, Foot Exams -Vision, Hearing, Aneurysm Screenings -Pulse Oximetry Wax Removal -Cryotherapy warts, tags, and precancerous lesions) -B12 Injections, Depo-Provera Injections -Allergy Injections (dose per Allergist) -Suture Removal -Incision & Drainage of Abscesses -Well visits for patients of ALL ages -Problem-focused visits for patients of ALL ages -Pap smears/Gynecologic exams/Perimenopause and Menopause Care -Employee physicals (no CDL), College physicals, Sports physicals -Pre-operative exams -STD exams/treatment -Vaccines for Children: Alternative Schedules may be followed after discussion with Physician. We follow the guidelines and standards established by the American Academy of Pediatricians and the American Academy of Family Physicians -Adult Vaccines: Hepatitis medications (We will help coordinate your travel care) At The Health Center for Integrative Medicine, we specialize in a variety of issues that are often not fully addressed at regular Family Practices.
